Aboubacar Sidiki KONATE

CEO, GKS Logistics

"Leadership is about empowering others to achieve collective success."

Our Journey

From our humble beginnings to our current position as regional leader, each step has been marked by innovation.

We continue to invest in technology and talent to serve our clients with excellence.

2019 Founded GKS Logistics
2021 Regional Expansion
2025 Continental Leadership

My Role & Mission

As CEO, I lead our strategic vision and drive innovation across all our operations, ensuring we remain at the forefront of African logistics.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategic vision and leadership
  • International strategic partnerships
  • Innovation and business expansion
  • African market development

Beyond Work: Passions & Interests

En tant qu'entrepreneur et leader, je suis passionné par l'innovation technologique et le développement économique de l'Afrique. Je crois fermement que l'entrepreneuriat est la clé pour transformer les défis africains en opportunités de croissance et de prospérité.

Innovation & Emerging Technologies
African Economic Development
Entrepreneur Mentorship
Strategy & Investment
